tweets.text:
On this #MigrantsDay, we highlight the importance of ensuring safe and healthy work conditions for migrant workers. They are one of the most vulnerable groups in the EU's workforce and are greatly exposed to MSD risks. 
Learn more: https://t.co/Y7oxT3CzAy
#EUhealthyworkplaces https://t.co/LkbyAYXLQ9

@DraMyte 40 % of migrant workers in the EU spend at least a quarter of their time carrying heavy loads (31 % native workers) & 51 % spend at least a quarter of their time in tiring or painful positions (43 % native workers).We kindly invite you to revise the publication for + details.

@DraMyte @DraMyte thank you for your comment, we understand your concern. But if you have a look at our infosheet you´ll see that we are only talking about risk exposure average for migrant workers in all the EU – so this includes many different types of workers.

Today marks the International #MigrantsDay.
Evidence show that migrant workers are more likely to work in jobs with higher #OSH risks.
Join our efforts to ensure equal protection for all workers.    https://t.co/Qo1NYfxj8T @EU_ELA 
#EUhealthyworkplaces #MigrantWorkers #IMD2021 https://t.co/cq66Hni1ZZ

#ArtificialIntelligence, #VirtualReality & online platforms point at an exciting future of work but may also bring new #OSH challenges.
In what ways  the virtual workplace could affect OSH?
Check out our new discussion paper on the topic ➡️ https://t.co/cGVj1SgDji https://t.co/UZYfRsYaPj

Our Interim Executive Director, William Cockburn, presents EU-OSHA´s contribution on the new #OSH Strategic Framework 21-27 & the #EUhealthyworkplaces Campaign at the Employment Committee of the @Europarl_EN 

🔴 Follow online tomorrow 1 December at 11:15: https://t.co/Yy2TZvhplr https://t.co/jTsFo7BCHE

#EUhealthyworkplaces https://t.co/pwdqTCuoqX

urls.description: A new literature review maps the challenges that digital platform workers face — from inadequate social protection and digital surveillance to job and income insecurity. It examines the impact of these challenges on occupational safety and health (OSH), and looks at new initiatives and legislation aimed at preventing and managing OSH risks.
